Class Sea

java.lang.Object
battleship.Sea
public class Sea
extends java.lang.Object
A board with cell

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addShipHorizontally​(Ship ship, Position position)
    Add the ship given vertically at given position
    void addShipVertically​(Ship ship, Position position)
    Add the ship given horizontally at given position
    void display​(boolean defender)
    displays the board line by line and cell by cell, the display changes for the defender or the opponent, defined by the defender argument

    Return the board
    int gettotalLF()
    Return the total life points remaining of ships on the sea

    Shoot the cell referenced by a given position and return the answer

      Parameters:

    • display

      public void display​(boolean defender)
      displays the board line by line and cell by cell, the display changes for the defender or the opponent, defined by the defender argument
      Parameters:
      defender - true if display is for defender, false if for opponent
